name: Another Left Turn
description:
=== Created for/submitted to Ludum Dare 47 - 2020 ===

Another Left Turn is a FPS where the goal is to break out of the gameplay loop as fast as possible. Defeat all the enemies in a room to move on to the next. In every other room, your gun will randomly switch! How fast can you break the loop?

**Graphics, lag, and sensitivity are much better quality on downloadable builds

Controls:

ASDW / Arrow KeysMove    Left ClickShootRight ClickReloadEsc / P Pause
